member.name: T:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.IAlgorithm
member.summary: Simple algorithm interface which is not connected to any graph.

member.name: T:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.EdgeRouting.BundleEdgeRouting`3
member.summary:
EdgeBundler class is intended to be used for bundling and straightening of the edges of the graph. The goal is to get the layout that is less clutered and more suitable for analiyzing.
This class is based on the paper "Force-Directed Edge Bundling for Graph Visualization" by Danny Holten and Jarke J. van Wijk. http://www.win.tue.nl/~dholten/papers/forcebundles_eurovis.pdf
It was implemented and modified by Luka Potkonjak. Adapted for GraphX by PantheR.

member.name: M:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.EdgeRouting.BundleEdgeRouting`3.BundleEdges(`2,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`1})
member.summary: Bundles specified edges. Shapes of all the other edges remain the same, so this method is faster than the one for bundling all edges, but also produces less optimal layout.
member.param: Parent graph of the edge set
Edges that should be bundled
Rectangle in which the graph is laid out. Control points of bundled edges should not fall outside of this rectangle.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.EdgeRouting.BundleEdgeRouting`3.SubdivisionPoints
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of subdivision points each edge should have. Default value is 15.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.EdgeRouting.BundleEdgeRouting`3.Iterations
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of iterations for moving the control points. Default value is 50.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.EdgeRouting.BundleEdgeRouting`3.RepulseOpposite
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether opposite edges should attracts or repulse each other. Default value is false.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.EdgeRouting.BundleEdgeRouting`3.UseThreading
member.summary: Gets or sets the the value that determines if multiple threads should be used for the calculations. Default value is true.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.EdgeRouting.BundleEdgeRouting`3.SpringConstant
member.summary: Gets or sets the value for the spring constant. Edges are more easely bent if the value is lower. Default value is 10.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.EdgeRouting.BundleEdgeRouting`3.Threshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the treshold for the edge compatibility. Every pair of edges has the compatibility coefficient assigned to it. Range of the coefficient is from 0 to 1. Edges that have coefficient lower than the treshold between them are not considered for interaction. Default value is 0.2.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.EdgeRouting.BundleEdgeRouting`3.RepulsionCoefficient
member.summary: If repulseOpposite is true, this determines how much will opposite edges repulse eachother. From -1 to 0. Default is -0.1

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.EdgeRouting.BundleEdgeRouting`3.Straightening
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of straightening that will be applied after every bundling. This can produce better-looking graphs. Default value is 0.15, range is from 0 to 1.

member.name: M:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.ParameterizedLayoutAlgorithmBase`4.InitializeWithRandomPositions(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary:
Initializes the positions of the vertices. Assign a random position inside the 'bounding box' to the vertices without positions. It does NOT modify the position of the other vertices.
It generates an IterationEnded event.
Bounding box: x coordinates: double.Epsilon - width y coordinates: double.Epsilon - height
member.param: Width of the bounding box.
Height of the bounding box.

member.name: M:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.ParameterizedLayoutAlgorithmBase`4.InitializeWithRandomPositions(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary:
Initializes the positions of the vertices. Assign a random position inside the 'bounding box' to the vertices without positions. It does NOT modify the position of the other vertices.
It generates an IterationEnded event.
Bounding box: x coordinates: double.Epsilon - width y coordinates: double.Epsilon - height
member.param: Width of the bounding box.
Height of the bounding box.
Translates the generated x coordinate.
Translates the generated y coordinate.

member.summary: Default constructor

member.summary: Count of the vertices (used to calculate the constants)

member.summary: Gets the computed ideal edge length.

member.summary: Gets the initial temperature of the mass.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.FDP.FRLayoutParametersBase.ConstantOfAttraction
member.summary: Constant. Equals with K * attractionMultiplier

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.FDP.FRLayoutParametersBase.AttractionMultiplier
member.summary: Multiplier of the attraction. Default value is 2.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.FDP.FRLayoutParametersBase.ConstantOfRepulsion
member.summary: Constant. Equals with Pow(K * repulsiveMultiplier, 2)

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.FDP.FRLayoutParametersBase.RepulsiveMultiplier
member.summary: Multiplier of the repulsion. Default value is 1.

member.summary: Limit of the iterations. Default value is 200.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.FDP.FRLayoutParametersBase.Lambda
member.summary: Lambda for the cooling. Default value is 0.95.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.FDP.FRLayoutParametersBase.CoolingFunction
member.summary: Gets or sets the cooling function which could be Linear or Exponential.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.FDP.BoundedFRLayoutParameters.Width
member.summary: Width of the bounding box.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.FDP.BoundedFRLayoutParameters.Height
member.summary: Height of the bounding box.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.FDP.BoundedFRLayoutParameters.K
member.summary: Constant. IdealEdgeLength = sqrt(height * width / vertexCount)

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.FDP.BoundedFRLayoutParameters.InitialTemperature
member.summary: Gets the initial temperature of the mass.

random initial positions (if the position is not null)

member.summary: Replace long edge (span(edge) > 1) with dummy vertices or segments (span(edge) > 2).
Adds a new segment to the sparse compaction graph.

The target vertex of the segment.
The edge which has been replaced by the dummy vertices and this segment.
member.returns: The newly created segment.

member.summary: Sweeps between the and in the way represented by the step

The index of the last layer (where the sweeping ends).
Increment or decrement of the layer index. (1 or -1)

Split this container at segment into two contsiners and . All elements less than s are stored in container and those who are greated than in . Element is neither in or .

member.summary: First step of the algorithm. Filters the unappropriate vertices and edges.

member.name: M:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.Hierarchical.SugiyamaLayoutAlgorithm`3.ReplaceLongEdges
member.summary: Long edges ( span(e) > 1 ) will be replaced by span(e) edges (1 edge between every 2 neighbor layer) and span(e)-1 dummy vertices will be added to graph.

If this is a dirty sweep

member.summary: The index of the layer where this vertex belongs to.

member.name: P:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.Hierarchical.SugiyamaLayoutAlgorithm`3.SugiVertex.IsDummyVertex
member.summary: Gets that this vertex is a dummy vertex (a point of a replaced long edge) or not.

member.name: M:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.Hierarchical.SugiyamaLayoutAlgorithm`3.VertexLayer.Measure(GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.Hierarchical.SugiyamaLayoutAlgorithm{`0,`1,`2}.BaryCenter,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Computes the measures for every vertex in the layer by the given barycenters.
member.param: The barycenters.

If true, the barycenters will be computed based on the RealPosition.X value of the vertices. Otherwise the barycenter will be computed based on the value of the Position field (which is basically the index of the vertex inside the layer).

member.name: M:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.Hierarchical.SugiyamaLayoutAlgorithm`3.VertexLayer.Measure(GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.Hierarchical.SugiyamaLayoutAlgorithm{`0,`1,`2}.SugiVertex,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Computes the measure for the given .
Computes the barycenter of the given based on positions of the vertices on other side of the given .
member.param: The vertex which barycenter will be computed.
The edges used for the computation.
member.returns: The computed barycenter.

member.name: M:GraphX.GraphSharp.Algorithms.Layout.Simple.Hierarchical.SugiyamaLayoutAlgorithm`3.VertexLayer.ComputeHeight
member.summary: Computes the height of the vertexlayer (which is the maximum height of the vertices in this layer).
member.returns: Returns with the computed height of the layer.

member.summary: Changes the order of the vertices with the same measure. It does that in the brute-force way (every permutation will be analyzed). Vertices should be sorted by it's measures.

member.summary: Gets is custom layout selected and used

member.name: P:GraphX.Logic.GXLogicCore`3.EdgeCurvingEnabled
member.summary: Use edge curving technique for smoother edges. Default value is false.

member.name: P:GraphX.Logic.GXLogicCore`3.EdgeCurvingTolerance
member.summary: This is roughly the length of each line segment in the polyline approximation to a continuous curve in WPF units. The smaller the number the smoother the curve, but slower the performance. Default is 8.

member.name: P:GraphX.Logic.GXLogicCore`3.EdgeSelfLoopCircleRadius
member.summary: Radius of a self-loop edge, which is drawn as a circle. Default is 20.

member.name: P:GraphX.Logic.GXLogicCore`3.EdgeSelfLoopCircleOffset
member.summary: Offset from the corner of the vertex. Useful for custom vertex shapes. Default is 10,10.

member.name: P:GraphX.Logic.GXLogicCore`3.EdgeShowSelfLooped
member.summary: Show self looped edges on vertices. Default value is true.

member.name: P:GraphX.Logic.GXLogicCore`3.Graph
member.summary: Main graph object

member.name: P:GraphX.Logic.GXLogicCore`3.EnableParallelEdges
member.summary: Enables parallel edges. All edges between the same nodes will be separated by ParallelEdgeDistance value. This is post-process procedure and it may be performance-costly.

member.name: P:GraphX.Logic.GXLogicCore`3.ParallelEdgeDistance
member.summary: Distance by which edges are parallelized if EnableParallelEdges is true. Default value is 5.

member.name: P:GraphX.Logic.GXLogicCore`3.IsEdgeRoutingEnabled
member.summary: Value overloaded for extensibility purposes. Indicates if ER will be performed on Compute().
